entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sioux Lookout
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:58 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -24.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sioux Lookout Airport 02:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -24.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -27.5°C
Wind: NW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023
